value.title: Pence plays Covid defense and other things to watch at the vice presidential debate
value.excerpt: It’s the former radio host (turned governor) vs. the former prosecutor (turned senator) in Salt Lake City Wednesday for the first and only vice presidential debate.

value.title: Ed Rollins: VP debate –Harris, Pence faceoff in Utah and America should look to hear this one word
value.excerpt: It is not unrealistic to think that Pence or Harris could be America’s president in the not-too-distant future

value.title: Mike Pence: What you need to know about the Republican nominee for vice president
value.excerpt: Everything you need to know about Vice President Mike Pence, Donald Trump's vice president on the Republican ticket.

value.title: Mike Pence Gets A Rare Moment In The National Spotlight
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence takes the stage for a debate with Kamala Harris in Salt Lake City Wednesday night. The debate comes amid President Trump's treatment for COVID-19. Pence has tested negative.

value.title: Mike Pence Brought Conservatives Home. What If They Don’t Need Him Anymore?
value.excerpt: Evangelical Christians were drawn to the vice president because he shared their values. But Trump’s style has made defiance of political norms, not a Pence specialty, seem appealing.

value.title: Pence team objects to plexiglass being installed for both candidates at VP debate
value.excerpt: Mike Pence does not want plexiglass barriers around him at the vice presidential debate against Kamala Harris on Wednesday, a top aide to the vice president told CNN on Tuesday, rebuffing an announcement from the Commission on Presidential debates that the dividers would be used to prevent the spread

value.title: Tim Kaine on What It’s Like to Debate Mike Pence
value.excerpt: Mr. Kaine, Hillary Clinton’s running mate in 2016, spoke to The Times about what lies ahead for Senator Kamala Harris at Wednesday’s V.P. debate.

value.title: Pence to vote in Indiana this week as state's early voting begins
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence and second lady Karen Pence are expected to fly to Indiana Friday, to vote in person from the second family’s home state, as early voting kicked off Tuesday.

value.title: Pence faces tall task in VP debate
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence faces a challenging environment in the first vice presidential debate on Wednesday, which will take place against an unprecedented backdrop of events.

value.title: Don’t Underestimate Mike Pence
value.excerpt: A soothing dose of Hoosier calm might be just what the Trump campaign needed.

value.title: Kamala Harris and Mike Pence will reportedly be separated by plexiglass in debate on Wednesday night
value.excerpt: The highest profile use of plexiglass so far this election cycle came from Democrat Jaime Harrison in his debate against Republican South Carolina Sen. Lindsey Graham.

value.title: Pence to maintain 'aggressive schedule' as Trump remains in hospital, campaign adviser says
value.excerpt: A senior Trump campaign adviser said on Sunday that Vice President Mike Pence will maintain “a very full aggressive schedule” while the president is being treated in the hospital for COVID-19.

value.title: VP Pence and second lady test negative for COVID, twice in three days
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence and his wife, Karen, have against tested negative again for COVID-19 just days after President Trump and the first lady were diagnosed with the virus, White House officials confirmed to Fox News.

value.title: With Trump hospitalized, VP Mike Pence will visit Arizona for a Thursday rally, campaign says
value.excerpt: Pence will host a rally at a tactical-gear supply business in Peoria. His visit had been expected for weeks, but COVID-19 has since rocked the campaign.

value.title: VP Pence ordered borders closed after CDC experts refused
value.excerpt: Two former U.S. health officials tell AP that Vice President Mike Pence in March directed the nation’s top disease control agency to use its emergency powers to effectively seal the borders against im

value.title: The Real Nightmare Scenario: A Sick Mike Pence
value.excerpt: The U.S. government knows how to handle an incapacitated commander in chief, but has no idea how to deal with a very sick vice president.

value.title: White House says Trump 'not incapacitated,' working from isolation; Pence negative
value.excerpt: The White House tried to reassure Americans on Friday that President Donald Trump was still working from isolation, after his bombshell announcement that he had caught the coronavirus threw the administration and presidential election campaign into uncertainty.

value.title: Mike Pence and his wife tested negative Friday morning.
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence announced Friday that he and his wife, Karen, had tested negative for the coronavirus, just hours after President Trump and the first lady announced they had both tested positive and were quarantining at the White House.

value.title: Brian Howey: Barrett confirmation would be a Pence achievement
value.excerpt: It stands to be a future framed picture in Vice President Mike Pence’s office: On Monday, he was climbing the U.S. Capitol steps with 7th Circuit Judge Amy Coney Barrett of South Bend. The tall, slender judge is adjusting her necklace;

value.title: WATCH LIVE: Vice President Pence speaks at Iowa rallies
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence will visit Carter Lake and Des Moines, Iowa Oct. 1, where he will speak at political rallies being held in the state.

value.title: First trailer for Borat 2 is a whirlwind of crotch masks, Mike Pence, and incest jokes
value.excerpt: Sacha Baron Cohen’s Borat character returns to induce cringeworthy terror upon unsuspecting interview subjects in a sequel to 2006’s Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan later this month.

value.title: Second lady Karen Pence makes 3 veteran-themed stops in Jacksonville area
value.excerpt: Karen Pence, wife of Vice President Mike Pence, made three stops in Jacksonville, focused on veterans' issues.

value.title: VP Mike Pence visits Atlanta for Cobb County event
value.excerpt: As part of the campaigning, Vice President Mike Pence will make a swing back through Georgia to energize Republican voters, less than a week after President Trump's visit. Here's what we know about the vice president's visit. According to the schedule from ...

value.title: 'Borat' sequel -- with Pence name in title -- to be released before 2020 election by Amazon
value.excerpt: The 2006 original film, written and produced by Cohen, follows the titular character, a Kazakh television personality, as he explores America.

value.title: Borat's Mike Pence-Targeting Sequel to Screen on Amazon Prime Ahead of Election Day
value.excerpt: Amazon Prime recently acquired Borat's sequel and is planning to air Sasha Baron Cohen's latest mockumentary at the end of October.

value.title: Former Pence Adviser 'Appalled' At Pressure White House Placed On CDC To Open Schools
value.excerpt: Olivia Troye's latest comments confirm reports in New York Times about pressure from the White House to downplay the coronavirus' impact on children.

value.title: Pence tells Americans to 'anticipate that cases will rise' with more coronavirus testing
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence said that "the American people should anticipate that cases will rise" as efforts for increased coronavirus testing are implemented and states in the Midwest are experiencing a surge.

value.title: Borat 2 Gets Official Title, Targets Mike Pence, Rudy Giuliani and More
value.excerpt: Sacha Baron Cohen's secretly-filmed sequel to Borat has a title in keeping with the original, and hints about its unwitting co-stars have surfaced.

value.title: Former Pence aide says staffers discussed Trumps potential refusal to leave the White House
value.excerpt: A former White House aide said Friday that staffers discussed the possibility that President Trump would refuse to peacefully leave his post and transfer power should he lose the Nov. 3 election.
